title: Edit in the table
label: Spreadsheet like editing
text: You can edit your database just like you edit a spreadsheet. Update rows easily by just typing in new data.

title: Create table
label: Create a table
text: Create tables, columns and rows right in the dashboard. Without the need to use SQL.

title: Foreign keys
label: Set up foreign keys
text: Set up columns to use foreign keys, joining your tables together with meaning.

title: Export to CSV
label: Select and Export
text: Just pick the rows you want and you can export them into a CSV
